title: My Not-So-Definitive Guide to a Joyful Summer (pun intended)
description: We’re in the early days of summer, friends! The air has been heavy this week with warm rainstorms and thunder in the distance (to Graham’s dismay), and I’m fresh off a successful Pool Dad Memorial Day weekend. Vibes are on the up!  I’ve decided to ease into the season relaxed, with Diet Cokes stocked in the coldest shelf in the fridge and chilled washcloths on another.  Luxury in the small things, you know? Continue reading My Not-So-Definitive Guide to a Joyful Summer (pun intended) at Joy the Baker.
author: Joy the Baker
